SourceText: ParentText is easiest to use when you receive content as videos, images and text. However, your data bundle and bandwidth may not support videos. To save on data, you can choose to receive the same content with a smaller audio file or as text. How would you like to receive ParentText?
text: I-ParentText kulula ukuyisebenzisa xa ufumana umxholo ngeevidiyo, imifanekiso kunye nemibhalo. Noxa kunjalo, idatha yakho kunye ne-bandwidth ayinakuzixhasa iividiyo. Ukugcina idatha, unokukhetha ukufumana umxholo ofanayo kunye nefayile yesandi encinci okanye njengombhalo. Ungathanda ukuyifumana njani i-ParentText?

SourceText: Sorry, I don't understand what you mean.
Are you a WOMAN or MAN?
Is @fields.child_nickname a girl or a boy?
note: Strings like @fields.xxx and @results.yyy should not be translated.

SourceText: Is your child a girl or a boy?
text: Ingaba umntwana wakho yintombi okanye yinkwenkwe?

SourceText: Which province do you live in?
Please provide us with your child's first name.
Please type "N" if you prefer not to answer.
text: Nceda chwetheza â€œNâ€ ukuba ukhetha ukungaphenduli.

SourceText: How should we print your name on the certificate?
text: Singalibhala njani igama lakho kwi satifikethi?

SourceText: âœ…Your personal information is safe and private. Your name and information will not be public, but your responses will be kept and could be used by researchers to learn how to support families like yours.
text: âœ…Inkcukacha zakho malunga nawe zikhuselekile kwayi ziyimfihlo. Igama lakho nenkcukacha zakho azizosasazwa, kodwa iimpendulo zakho zizogcinwa kwaye zingasetyenziwa ngabaphandi ukkufunda ukuba bangazixhasa njani na iintsapho ezinjengale yakho.

SourceText: âŒYou can stop when you want. Just type {STOP}
text: âŒUnga yeka xa ufuna. Bhala nje {STOP}

SourceText: Press YES if you agree with this. Type "EXIT" if you do not want to participate.
text: Cofa EWE ukuba uyavumelana kule into. Cofa "PHUMA" ukuba awufuni ukuthatha inxaxheba.

SourceText: That is wonderful, thank you so much!
Can you please confirm that you are 16 years old or older?
text: Ungakwazi ukuqinisekisa ukuba una 16 iminyaka yakho yobudala okanye ungaphezulu?

SourceText: Are you sure you do not want to get these messages? If you do not want to receive any more messages, please type NO. If you made a mistake, please press BACK and choose another option.
text: Ingaba uqinisekile ukuba awufuni ukuyifumana lemiyalezo? Ukuba awufuni ukufumana nayiphina imiyalezo, ndicela uchwetheze HAYI. Ukuba wenze impazamo, ndicela ucofe u UMVA kaye ukhethe olunye ukhetho.

SourceText: If you ever return to participate in the programme, type "HELLO".
text: Ukuba uye waphinda wabuya wabayinxalenye kule nkqubo, chwetheza "MOLO".

SourceText: We hope to see you again soon, and we wish you a happy and peaceful day!
text: Sinethemba lokukubona kwakhona kungekudala, kwaye sikunqwenelela usuku olumnandi nolunoxolo!

SourceText: Sorry, ParentText is only for people over the age of 16. Do you confirm that you are under the age of 16?
text: Uxolo, I Parent Text yeyabantu abaneminyaka engaphezulu ku 16. Ungakwazi ukuqinisekisa ukuba ungaphantsi kweminyaka eyi 16?

SourceText: If you want to experience ParentText, you can always share it with your parents or caregivers.
text: Ukuba ngaba ufuna imvakalelo yeParentText, ungayisebenzisa kunye nabazali okanye abagcini bakho.

SourceText: Here is a video that shows how to use ParentText.
text: Nantsi ividiyo ebonisa ukuba isetyenziswa njani i-ParentText.

SourceText: When was @fields.child_nickname born? Enter their date of birth in the following format: DD/MM/YYYY. For example, if your child was born on May 19, 2010, enter 19/05/2010.
text: Kwakukunini u- @fields.child_nickname ezelwe? faka usuku lokuzalwa ulandele lendlela: DD/MM/YYYY. umzekelo, Ukuba umntwana wakho wazalwa ngo May 19, 2010.

Please enter a valid date for your child's birth in the following format: DD/MM/YYYY. For example, if your child was born on May 19, 2010, enter 19/05/2010.

Nceda ufake umhla osemthethweni wokuzalwa komntwana wakho ngolu hlobo lulandelayo: DD/MM/YYYY. Umzekelo, ukuba umntwana wakho wazalwa ngoMeyi 19, 2010, faka 19/05/2010.

SourceText: Welcome to ParentText! This chatbot has been designed with and for parents just like you. We hope you find it useful!
text: Wamkelekile kwi-ParentText! Eli qonga lokuncokola lenzelwe abazali abanje ngawe. Siyathemba uyakuyifumana iluncedo!

SourceText: ParentText will help you with all of the children in your life, but in this programme, we are focusing on just one child at a time.
text: I ParentText izakunceda ngabo bonke abantwana bakho kubomi bakho, kodwa kulenkqubo, sijongana nomntwan omnye ngexesha.

SourceText: Would you like to go back to the previous messages?
That's okay. Type {HELP} at any time if you would like the details of emergency services or other hotlines.
text: Kulungile. Chwetheza {HELP} nangeliphi na ixesha xa ufuna inkcukacha ngenkonzo zongxamiseko okanye umnxeba.

SourceText: Here are the contact details of your local emergency services:
text: Nazi iinkcukacha zoqhagamshelwano zeenkonzo zakho zengxakeko zengingqi:

SourceText: Type {HELP} at any time if you would like the details of emergency services or other hotlines. Remember everything you say will be completely private!
text: Chwetheza {HELP} nangeliphi na ixesha ukuba ungathanda ukufumana iinkcukacha zenkonzo zongxamiseko okanye inombolo zomnxeba!

SourceText: If you ever feel like talking privately to a trained professional, you can call:
text: Ukuba ngaba unemvakalelo yokuthetha bucala negcisa eliqeqeshiweyo, ungatsalela:

SourceText: Here are the contact details of your local medical services:
text: Nazi iinkcukacha zoqhagamshelwano zeenkonzo zakho zonyango zengingqi:

SourceText: Are you currently facing an emergency?
Do you need some support with an emotional issue?
text: Ingaba ufuna inkxaso ethile ngomba wasemoyeni?

SourceText: Are you currently experiencing a health issue?
Are you experiencing an unsafe situation?
Do you need some urgent help?
Please type {MENU} to access resources and review completed modules, {PLAY} to receive a playful activity you can complete with your child, or {HELP} to access local support resources for a crisis.
text: Ndicela uchwetheze {MENU} ukufumana izixhobo kwayee uphonononge iimodyuli ezigqityiweyo, {PLAY} ukufumana umsebenzi wokudlala onokuthi uwenze nomntwana wakho, okanye {HELP} ukufikelela kwizibonelelo zenkxaso zasekuhlaleni ngexesha likaxakeka.

SourceText: You have not given consent to participate in this programme. Would you like to participate?
text: Awuyinikanga imvume yokuthatha inxaxheba kule nkqubo. Ungathanda ukuthatha inxaxheba?

SourceText: If you ever decide to participate in the programme, type HELLO.
text: Ukuba uthatha isigqibo sokuthatha inxaxheba kwinkqubo, chwetheza MOLO.

SourceText: Parenting is hard. ParentText may help. Would you like to continue your progress?
text: Ubuzali bunzima. I-ParentText inganceda. Ungathanda ukuqhubekeka nenkqubela yakho?

SourceText: That's okay. If you ever decide to come back, type HELLO.
text: Kulungile. Ukuba uye wagqiba ukubuyela umva, cofa MOLO.

SourceText: You are already part of ParentText!
Staying in ParentText helps you and your child. Are you sure you want to exit the programme?
text: Ukuhlala kwi ParentText kunganceda wena kunye nomntwana wakho. Uqinisekile ukuba ufuna ukuphuma kule nkqubo?

SourceText: If you do not want to receive any more messages, please type "EXIT".
text: Ukuba awufuni ukufumana nayiphina na imiyalezo, Sicela uchwetheze "PHUMA".

SourceText: If you made a mistake, please type "BACK".
Thank you for participating. If you want to return to the programme, type HELLO.
text: Enkosi ngokuthatha inxaxheba. Ukuba ufuna ukubuyela kule nkqubo, cofa MOLO.

SourceText: We hope to see you again soon!
We are so glad you want to stick around! We will resume your progress tomorrow.
text: Siyavuya kakhulu kuba ufuna ukuhlala nathi! Sizakuqhubekeka nenkqubela yakho ngomso.

SourceText: This feature will be available once you have completed registration. It wonâ€™t take long. Please continue your progress!
text: Eli nqaku liza kufumaneka xa sele ugqibile ukubhalisa. Ayizukuthatha ixesha elide. Nceda uqhubeke nenkqubela yakho!

SourceText: The menu will be available once you have completed registration. It wonâ€™t take long. Please continue your progress!
text: Olu luhlu luza kufumaneka kanye xa ugqibile ubhaliso. Ayizothatha xesha lide. Sicela uqhubeke nenkqubela phambili yakho yakho!

SourceText: ParentText has begun. You are just 5 days away from earning your parenting certificate. Are you ready to complete your registration and get started?
text: I-ParentText seyiqalile. Unentsuku ezintlanu ukuyofika ekufumaneni isatifikethi sakho sobuzali. Ukulungele ukugqiba ubhaliso kwaye ube sewuqalisa?

SourceText: Select one of the options below:
It seems like you've got some catching up to do! Do you want to complete your previous unfinished lesson or start a new lesson?

SourceText: You completed the ParentText demo. Type {RESET} and then {FACSTART} to re-start from the beginning.
text: Uyigqibile idemo ye ParentText. Chwetheza {RESET} kwa ngoko {FACSTART} ukuphinda uqalele ekuqaleni.

SourceText: It looks like ParentText isn't working for you. Can you tell us why?
text: Kubonakala ngathi i-ParentText ayikusebenzeli. Ungasixelela ukuba kutheni?

SourceText: ParentText should only take 10 minutes a day to complete. Would you like to try a new lesson now?
text: I-ParentText kufuneka ithathe nje imizuzu elishumi kuphela ngosuku ukuyigqiba. Ingaba ungathanda ukuzama isifundo esitsha ngoku?

SourceText: Oh no! Why is ParentText not helpful?

It may seem like spending one-on-one time with your child won't help you with their behaviour right away, but patience is key. This time together helps you understand each other better and build a strong bond. When children feel heard and supported like this, it often helps improve their behaviour over time.
text: Kungabonakala ingathi ukuchitha ixesha kunye nomntwana wakho akuyi kukunceda ngokuziphatha kwabo kwangoko, kodwa umonde ngundoqo. Eli xesha kunye linceda ukuba niqondane ngcono kwaye lakha ubudlelwane obomeleleyo. Xa abantwana beziva beviwa kwaye bexhaswa ngolu hlobo, kudla ngokunceda ukuphucula ukuziphatha kwabo ekuhambeni kwexesha.

SourceText: Would you like to try a new lesson now to learn more about one-on-one time?
text: Ingaba ungathanda ukuzama isifundo esitsha ngoku ukuze ufunde ngakumbi malunga nexesha elinye kunye?

SourceText: I might know some resources that can help.
Feeling sad, stressed, or having trouble with your child's behaviour? ğŸ˜Ÿ These places can help: ğŸ’¡
text: Uziva ulusizi, uxinzelelekile, okanye unengxaki ngokuziphatha komntwana wakho? ğŸ˜Ÿ Ezi ndawo zinokunceda: ğŸ’¡

SourceText: Take care of yourself! ğŸ˜Š Your local clinic is here to help with any health problems. If you need extra support, here are some free helplines: â˜ï¸
text: Zikhathalele! ğŸ˜Š Iklinikhi yendawo yakho ilapha ukunceda naziphi na iingxaki zempilo. Ukuba ufuna inkxaso eyongezelelweyo, nantsi iminxeba yoncedo yasimahla: â˜ï¸

SourceText: Seeing or going through violence can be scary and confusing. ğŸ˜” But there are people who can help you and your child! ğŸ’•
text: Ukubona okanye ukuba kubundlobongela kunokothusa kwaye kukubhide. ğŸ˜” Kodwa kukho abantu abanokukunceda nomntwana wakho! ğŸ’•

SourceText: A lot of our energy goes into helping the person struggling with substance abuse. While thatâ€™s important, you and your family need support too! ğŸ’– Find help for everyone below: â¬‡ï¸
text: Amandla ethu amaninzi aya ekuncedeni umntu onengxaki yokuxhaphaza iziyobisi. Nangona oko kubalulekile, wena nosapho lwakho nani nifuna inkxaso! ğŸ’– Fumana uncedo lomntu wonke ongezantsi: â¬‡ï¸

SourceText: Family life can be tough! ğŸ˜£ Did you know that social workers at your local Department of Social Development can help with parenting skills, fatherhood, teenage pregnancy, and family or relationship counselling? If there isnâ€™t a DSD office near you, NGOs in your area offer this support too. ğŸŒ
text: Ubomi bentsapho bunokuba nzima! ğŸ˜£ Ubusazi na ukuba oonontlalontle kwiSebe loPhuhliso lweNtlalo banokukunceda ngezakhono zobuzali, ubutata, ukukhulelwa kolutsha, kunye neengcebiso kusapho okanye ngobudlelwane? Ukuba akho ofisi yeDSD kufutshane nawe, iiNGOs kwingingqi yakho nazo zibonelela ngale nkxaso. ğŸŒ

SourceText: Legal and SASSA issues can be stressful and confusing! ğŸ˜µ There may be more support available than you realise at the organisations below: ğŸ‘‡
text: Eyomthetho kunye no-SASSA imiba inganoxinzelelo kwaye iyabhida! ğŸ˜µ Kungakhona inkxaso eyongezelelweyo kunokuba usazi kulemibutho ingezantsi: ğŸ‘‡

SourceText: Understanding sexual and gender development can be confusing and hard to talk about. ğŸŒˆ Weâ€™re all unique! Hereâ€™s some support and guidance: ğŸ’¡
text: Ukuqonda ukukhula ngokwezesondo kunye nesini kunokubhida kwaye kubenzima ukuthetha ngako. ğŸŒˆSonke sahlukile! Nazi ezinye zenkxaso kunye nesikhokhelo: ğŸ’¡

SourceText: School is where your child spends most of their time. ğŸ« Making sure they are in school, happy, and supported is really important. If you're having trouble with any school issues, hereâ€™s some help: ğŸ“š
text: Esikolweni kulapho umntwana wakho achitha khona ixesha lakhe elininzi.ğŸ« Ukuqinisekisa ukuba usesikolweni, kwaye wonwabile, kwaye uyaxhaswa kubalulekile kakhulu. Ukuba usokoliswa nayiphi na imiba yesikolo, nalu uncedo: ğŸ“š

SourceText: Iâ€™m sorry that I cannot help with your challenge. If you want to access this information again, you can type {HELP} at any time.
text: Ndiyaxolisa ngokuba ndingakwazi ukukunceda kumceli-mngeni wakho. Ukuba ufuna ukufikelela kulwazi kwakhona, ungabhala {HELP} nangaliphi na ixesha.

SourceText: I hope this was helpful! You can access this information at any time by typing {HELP}.
text: Siyathemba lento ibeluncedo! Ungakwazi ukuzifumana ezinkcukacha nangeliphina ixesha ngokubhala {HELP}.

SourceText: If you are facing challenges that are making it more difficult to focus on parenting, I have some resources that can help.
text: Ukuba ujongene nemiceli-mngeni eyenza kube nzima ngakumbi ukugxila kubuzali, ndinezixhobo ezithile ezinokukunceda.

SourceText: Thank you for letting us know.
Thatâ€™s okay. These skills are hard at first. I encourage you to complete ParentText. If you still want more support, here are some parenting resources available:
text: Oko kulungile. Ezi zakhono zinzima ekuqaleni. Ndiyakukhuthaza ukuba ugcwalise i-ParentText. Ukuba usafuna inkxaso eyongezelelekileyo, nazi ezinye izibonelelo zobuzali ezikhoyo:

SourceText: I hope this was helpful. See you tomorrow
Caring for a child with disabilities is challenging. Keep trying and remember to take care of yourself. Here are additional parenting resources for parents of children with special needs:
text: Ukukhathalela umntwana onokhubazeko kungumceli-mngeni. Qhubeka uzama kwaye ukhumbule ukuzikhathalela. Nazi izixhobo ezongezelelweyo zobuzali kwabazali babantwana abaneemfuno ezikhethekileyo:

SourceText: Itâ€™s great that you already know so much about parenting. More courses are released on ParentText all of the time. I will let you know when new ones are available. If you want to learn more now, you can join an in-person parenting programme near you:
text: Kuhle ukuba sele unolwazi oluninzi malunga nokuba ngumzali. Ezinye izifundo zikhutshwa kwi-ParentText ngalo lonke ixesha. Ndiza kukwazisa xa ezintsha zifumaneka. Ukuba ufuna ukufunda ngakumbi ngoku, ungangenela ngobuqu inkqubo yobuzali ekufutshane nawe:

SourceText: Caring for a child with disabilities is challenging. Keep trying and remember to take care of yourself.
text: Ukukhathalela umntwana onesiphene kungumceli-mngeni. Qhubeka uzama kwaye ukhumbule ukuzikhathalela.

SourceText: Here are additional parenting resources for parents of children with special needs:
text: Nazi izixhobo ezongezelelweyo zobuzali kubazali babantwana abaneemfuno ezikhethekileyo:

SourceText: I am sorry to hear that ParentText is not working on your phone. Here are a few steps you can try:
text: Ndiyaxolisa ukuva ukuba i-ParentText ayisebenzi kwifowuni yakho. Nanga amanyathelo ambalwa onokuthi uwazame:

SourceText: 1. Ensure you have the latest version of WhatsApp installed on your phone.
text: 1. Qinisekisa ukuba unenguqulelo yamva nje ye-WhatsApp efakwe kwifowuni yakho.

SourceText: 2. Check your internet connection to make sure it's stable.
text: 2. Jonga uqhagamshelwano lwe-internet yakho uqiniseke ukuba luzinzile.

SourceText: We're here to listen. Please tell how to make ParentText more helpful by sharing your feedback in a single message.
text: Silapha ukuze siphulaphule. Nceda usixelele indlela yokwenza i-ParentText ibe luncedo ngakumbi ngokwabelana ngengxelo yakho ngomyalezo omnye.

SourceText: Thank you for sharing your feedback.
Type 1 to resume the programme when you are ready!
ğŸ‰You did it!ğŸ‰Congratulations for completing your first course!
text: ğŸ‰Wenze kakuhle!ğŸ‰Sivuyisana nawe ngokugqibezela isifundo sakho sokuqala!

SourceText: The name you would like to have on your completion certificate is @fields.certificate_name. Is that correct?
text: Igama othanda libekhona kwisatifikethi sakho sokuba ugqibile ngu @fields.certificate_name. Ingaba lilo?
note: Strings like @fields.xxx and @results.yyy should not be translated.
